document.full_text: japan's olympus said on tuesday that it would give its 2011/12 earnings outlook by the end of june and that it could pull its troubled imaging division back into profit within 12-18 months.
document.title: olympus says expects to give earnings outlook by end: june
lines_and_colors: japan's olympus said on tuesday that it would give its 2011/12 earnings outlook by the end of june and that it could pull its troubled imaging division back into profit within 12-18 months.
